mil7.7.7:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘maṇiratanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.7:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekantaparisuddhājīvena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṁ na kenaci saddhiṁ missīyati;
mil7.7.7:2.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpehi pāpasahāyehi saddhiṁ na missitabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṁ jātiratanehi yojīyati;
mil7.7.7:3.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uttamavarajātimantehi saddhiṁ saṁvasitabbaṁ, paṭipannakaphalaṭṭhasekkhaphalasamaṅgīhi sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantatevijjachaḷabhiññasamaṇamaṇiratanehi saddhiṁ saṁvasitabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
